attributes.action: Olympic size Swimming Pool for Inner city Birmingham
attributes.additional_details:
Instead of office space the Council should encourage an Olympic size swimming pool to be explored on a portion of the Regional Investment Site. (Aston, Lozells, Newtown, B6 7LB)

Part of this site should be offered as D1, D2 uses (leisure/events) with the hope of having a swimming pool built, and open water swimming supported in the adjacent lake.

Serving north, central and inner city Birmingham this pool would sit next to the motorway so is nationally and regionally accessible, next to a river and lake that is used for water sports and in an area that would benefit hugely from this sort of investment.

In a massive plan for the area we should be encouraging various investments and not just office space!

Our idea
https://www.facebook.com/AstonArena/photos

The wider area plan
http://www.birmingham.gov.uk/astonaap

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
